docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Data preparation stage
docs.text:
• Convert my data into train and test.tsv in 70:30 ratio

data.xml
    |-train.tsv 
    |-test.tsv
- We are choosing only three tags in the xml data - 1. row Id, 2. title and body 3. Tags (Stackoverflow tags specific to python)

Tags feaures names row Id row ID title and body text stackoverflow tags Label - Python
